entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:06 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 2:27 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
